name: Toast Ghost (Mamottshuu)
description:
Originally made for wholesome games jam 2020.

(Re-uploaded in 2021)

Meet BOO a tiny little ghost trying to convince his buddies how SPOOOKY he is! However the little ghostie bites off more he can chew by scaring a witch that turns him into a piece of toast! Will Boo learn the error of his ways and change back. Find out in this adorable little visual novel! :)

Credits

Art, programming - Mamottshuu
( https://twitter.com/mamottshuu )

Music - Blue Mako
( https://bluemako.bandcamp.com/album/toast-ghost-original-soundtrack )

Thank you for checking out our little game! :D
